title: VictimBody
body:
<<if visited ("VictimBody") is false>>
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
Jacob Wright. Looks like his death was pretty brutal.
I should put some gloves on...
<<endif>>
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Head.Vomit
body:
He vomited before he died. A lot of things could have caused that.
I'll have to wait on the autopsy to know for sure why.
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Jacket
body:
There's a fair amount of blood on the jacket.
I'd better check his pockets...
[[Outside pocket|VictimBody.Jacket.OutsidePocket]]
[[Inside pocket|VictimBody.Jacket.InsidePocket]]
[[I'll check later|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Torso
body:
Geez... There's a lot of blood here....
[[Examine stomach wound|VictimBody.Torso.Stomach]]
[[Back|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Legs
body:
There's a fair amount of blood here.
No wounds though.
[[Check his pockets|VictimBody.Legs.Pockets]]

title: VictimBody.Hands
body:
There's a little bit of blood on his hands.
He's dropped a whisky glass on the floor.
<<if visited ("Whisky-Glass1") is true>>
[[Wait, there's another glass on the bench...|VictimBody.Conclusions.Glass]]
<<endif>>
[[Nothing else worth noting here.|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Jacket.InsidePocket
body:
His Wallet. 
Hmm. Still full of cash.
I guess it wasn't a robbery then.
[[Check Outside pocket|VictimBody.Jacket.OutsidePocket]]
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Jacket.OutsidePocket
body:
Lint. Nothing useful here.
[[Check Inside pocket|VictimBody.Jacket.InsidePocket]]
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Torso.Stomach
body:
There's a bullet hole in his stomach.
The alcohol would have made him bleed out much faster than normal...
The exit wound is very large. It looks like a high-calibre bullet caused this.
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Legs.Pockets
body:
Nothing but loose change..
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Conclusions.Glass
body:
[[He must have poured another one and forgotten about it.|VictimBody.Conclusions.Glass.Wrong]]
[[There must have been a visitor that the victim knew.|VictimBody.Conclusions.Glass.Right]]
<<if visited ("Kyle.SawRutledge") is true>>
[[It must have been poured for Logan Rutledge. I wonder why he left it unfinished...|VictimBody.Conlusions.Glass.LoganRutledge]]
<<endif>>
[[I don't have enough information to draw a conclusion yet.|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Conlusions.Glass.LoganRutledge
body:
Logan Rutledge was definately in the apartment before the victim died.
What his involvment in Mr Wright's death was, remains to be seen.
<<set $foundCluesConnectToSuspects to true>>
<<set $whiskeyglassConnectsTologan to true>>

<<if $foundSuspects is true and $foundClues is true>>
    <<set $CanTravel to true>>
<<endif>>

[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Conclusions.Glass.Wrong
body:
The victim likely poured an extra glass of whisky and forgot about it.
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Conclusions.Glass.Right
body:
It's most likely that the Victim knew whomever they poured the whisky for.
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Head
body:
[[The victim vomited before he died.|VictimBody.Head.Vomit]]
[[There's a large amount of bruising on the face.|VictimBody.Head.Bruises]]
[[I'll examine this later.|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Head.Bruises
body:
There's a large amount of bruising on his face.
Maybe he was hit with something...
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]
